title: Myrtle Beach Offers 60 Days of Deals This Fall
text:
Myrtle Beach Area Chamber of Commerce / CVB
Relax and unwind in Myrtle Beach during a "second summer" vacation
MYRTLE BEACH, S.C. , Aug. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Saying good-bye to summer doesn't have to mean leaving beautiful weather and beach vacations behind. In addition to offering warm weather and fewer crowds, the Myrtle Beach area of South Carolina is offering its fall visitors an opportunity to relax and unwind with discounted rates as they explore the destination's abundance of attractions, authentic coastal cuisine, and first-class entertainment.
Whether you're looking for a family friendly outing, a guys golf weekend, a fun-filled girlfriend getaway, or a "second summer" vacation, prepare to jump on these deals to enjoy great temperatures and beautiful coastline in Myrtle Beach this fall.
For a full listing of deals, visit http://www.visitmyrtlebeach.com/hotels/60-more-days-of-summer/ .
60 Days Specials & Events
(Alphabetically by Accommodation and Attraction)
LODGING
Avista Resort
Book six nights or more at Avista Resort and enjoy 60 percent off your total stay. Choose from spacious one, two and three-bedroom condos and then relax in the indoor and outdoor pools, lazy rivers and hot tubs and dine in the onsite restaurant. Other amenities include a fitness center and high-speed wireless Internet. Guests also receive the "Now That's Entertainment" package upon check-in which includes unlimited free DVD movie rentals and attraction tickets. Offer not valid for existing reservations. This offer is valid Sept. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 .
Bay View Resort
Stay four consecutive nights Sept. 1 through Oct. 31 and save an additional $60 on your entire stay. A minimum four-night stay is required.
Beach Colony Resort
Stay this September or October for two nights and receive 60 percent off a third by booking this deal. Amenities at this oceanfront resort include two outdoor pools and an outdoor whirlpool set amongst the lush landscaped lawn, an indoor pool and whirlpool and oceanfront dining. Upon check-in guests also receive the Vacation Member Benefits Card with great offers to local restaurants, shopping, entertainment and attractions. Supplies are limited. This offer is valid Sep. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 .
Beach Cove Resort
Stay Sunday through Thursday for two nights and receive 60 percent off a third night under this special. Relax at this tropical oceanfront paradise with four outdoor pools, three oceanfront whirlpools, a 350-foot oceanfront lazy river, and an indoor pool and whirlpool. Additional resort amenities include an oceanfront restaurant, racquetball court, free Wi-Fi and more. Guests will also receive the Vacation Member Benefits Card with exclusive offers to local restaurants, shopping, entertainment, attractions and more. Supplies are limited. This offer is valid Sep. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 .
Breakers Resort
Save an additional $60 on your entire stay if you book four consecutive nights Sept. 1 through Oct. 31 . A minimum four-night stay is required.
Captain's Quarters Resort
Stay three nights or longer and receive $60 in Resort Food & Beverage Credit this September and October. Enjoy all of the amenities Captain's Quarters has to offer including indoor and seasonal outdoor pools and whirlpools, an indoor lazy river, Ship Wreck Lagoon Pool, Vista 9 oceanfront breakfast restaurant, Loco Gecko Restaurant, a 20-lane bowling alley and so much more. Additionally, guests will receive the Vacation Member Benefits card at check-in, which offers exclusive discounts at Myrtle Beach's most popular restaurants, attractions, shows and shopping. Supplies are limited. This offer is valid Sep. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 .
Caravelle Resort
Enjoy breakfast for two for just 60 cents per day in Oceanfront Efficiencies or Ocean View Suites this September and October. Accommodations include the famous block long poolscape with a large heated pool, whirlpool, lazy river, kiddie lazy river and the Wild Water Pool. Additional resort amenities include an indoor pool and whirlpool, exercise room, game room, restaurant, lounge and more. Guests will also receive the Vacation Member Benefits Card with exclusive offers to local restaurants, shopping, entertainment, attractions and more. Supplies are limited. This offer is valid Sep. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 .
Caribbean Resort
When you buy two nights at Caribbean Resort, you'll receive one free. This offer is valid from Sept. 7 through Dec. 23, 2015 .
Compass Cove Resort
Save an additional $60 on your entire stay when you stay four consecutive nights Sept. 1 through Oct. 31 . A minimum four-night stay is required. Not valid Labor Day weekend.
Coral Beach Resort
Receive a $60 resort credit when you stay five nights or more. A limited number of rooms are available with this rate. This offer is valid Sept. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 .
Crown Reef Resort
Stay in September or October and receive a $30 Game Card and a $30 Resort Food & Beverage Credit per day, for an every day total of $60 in added value. CrownReef Beach Resort and Waterpark offers guests a wide array of amenities, including the year-round oceanfront four-story tall waterpark, silly sub, the longest oceanfront resort lazy river in Myrtle Beach , an indoor pool and whirlpool, outdoor pools and hot tubs, Loco Gecko Beach Shak Restaurant, game zone, exercise room, free Wi-Fi and more.In addition, guests will receive the Vacation Member Benefits Card at check–in which offers exclusive discounts at Myrtle Beach's most popular restaurants, attractions, shows and shopping. Supplies are limited. This offer is valid Sep. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 .
Driftwood at the Boardwalk
Driftwood at the Boardwalk is offering 60 Days from $60 , Sept. 7 through Nov. 7, 2015 . A family destination for over 70 years, Driftwood offers the personal service and prime location that keeps guests coming back year after year. Located in the heart of Myrtle Beach and just a few steps from the exciting Myrtle Beach boardwalk and SkyWheel, Driftwood at the Boardwalk boasts two oceanfront pools, and the option of ocean or city views.
Grand Atlantic Resort
Arrive on Sunday and receive a five nights stay for the price of four. This offer is valid through Sept. 30, 2015 .
Grande Shores Resort
Save 60 percent off your total stay when you book six nights or more. Enjoy your choice of fully equipped one, two and three-bedroom condos or hotel rooms with oceanfront amenities at Grande Shores Resort. Float down the lazy river, take a dip in the rooftop pool and hot tubs and dine in the onsite restaurant. Other amenities include a fitness center and high-speed wireless Internet. Guests also receive the "Now That's Entertainment" package that includes unlimited free DVD movie rentals and attraction tickets. Offer not valid for existing reservations. This offer is valid Sept. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 .
Holiday Inn At The Pavilion
Arrive on Sunday or Monday, and if you stay two nights or longer you'll receive an additional 15 percent off your entire stay. This offer is valid Sept. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 . Not valid Sept. 6 through Sept. 8 , weekends, holidays or special events.
Horizon at 77th
Stay six nights or more and save 60 percent off your total stay at Horizon at 77th. Spacious and fully-equipped one, two and three-bedroom condos await with onsite amenities such as a rooftop lazy river, indoor pool and hot tub. Other amenities include a fitness center and high-speed wireless Internet. Guests also receive unlimited free DVD movie rentals and attraction tickets with a complimentary "Now That's Entertainment" package. Offer not valid for existing reservations. This offer is valid Sept. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 .
hotel BLUE
Stay three nights or longer at hotel BLUE this September or October and receive a $60 Resort Food & Beverage Credit. Guests also receive the Vacation Member Benefits Card at check–in, which offers exclusive discounts at Myrtle Beach's most popular restaurants, attractions, shows and shopping. A limited supply of accommodations can be reserved, so book this deal soon to enjoy all the amenities hotel BLUE has to offer. Amenities include an oceanfront pool and hot tub and indoor lazy river as well as a seasonal swim-up pool bar, trendy lobby bar, Café BLUE serving Starbucks, Simply BLUE and more. Plus, hotel BLUE guests have access to all of the amenities at the Captain's Quarters building including a 20-lane bowling alley and arcade, indoor and outdoor pools, on-site dining and more. This offer is valid Sept. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 .
Island Vista
Stay three nights and save $60 (additional dates 10 percent off) Sept. 7 through Nov. 7, 2015 . Stunning beach views and quiet residential streets surround Island Vista, a premier Myrtle Beach luxury resort, with each oceanfront guestroom offering spectacular views of the blue Atlantic. On a warm fall day, head out to the oceanfront pool with access to the snack-packed seasonal Tiki Hut, or stay inside on a chilly day and enjoy the indoor splash pool, lazy river, and waterfall when you stay at Island Vista.
Landmark Resort
Stay this September or October and receive $60 in Resort Food & Beverage Credit per day by booking this deal. Onsite amenities include Gazebo Restaurant, Latitudes Grill, Havana Java Bar (proudly serving Starbucks Coffee), indoor and outdoor pools, whirlpools and hot tubs, two lazy river rides, seasonal putt-putt and H2OASIS Waterpark and so much more. Guests will also receive the Vacation Member Benefits Card at check-in that offers exclusive discounts at Myrtle Beach's most popular restaurants, attractions, shows and shopping. Supplies are limited. This offer is valid Sept. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 .
Long Bay Resort
Enjoy fall nights at Long Bay Resort when you book two nights, and receive a third free. This offer is valid from Sept. 7 through Dec. 23, 2015 .
Marina Inn at Grande Dunes
Save up to 35 percent off the best available room rates Sept. 1 through Nov. 30, 2015 at Marina Inn at Grande Dunes. Minimum night stays may be required over some dates and room types. Blackout dates may apply.
North Beach Plantation
Stay six or more nights and receive Sundays for just $60 . This offer applies to one- and two-bedroom condos, as well as two- and three-bedroom townhomes. This offer is valid from Sept. 1 through Oct. 31 , excluding Labor Day weekend.
Ocean 22 by Hilton Grand Vacations Club
Earn double Hilton HHonors Points when you book the 2x Points Package. To receive this deal visitors who are not already a Hilton HHonors member, must join before their stay. This offer is valid Sept. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 .
Ocean Creek Resort
Enjoy September and October weekday rates from just $60 a night and weekends from just $80 a night in select room types under this deal This beautiful 57-acre resort offers a wide range of pools and whirlpools along with on-site dining, a full service tennis center, fitness room, beach volleyball court and a natural creek and is located directly across the street from Barefoot Landing. Plus, upon check-in guests receive the Benefits Card with great offers to local restaurants, shopping, entertainment and attractions. Supplies are limited. This offer is valid Sept. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 .
Ocean Reef Resort
Book two nights, and receive one free. This offer is valid from Sept. 7 through Dec. 23, 2015 .
The Oceanfront Litchfield Inn
Receive 60 Days of Savings at 15 percent off Sept. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 . The Oceanfront Litchfield Inn lies nestled in the quiet neighborhood of Pawleys Island . Known as the Hammock Coast, Pawleys Island offers the proximity to Myrtle Beach without the crowds. Featuring two oceanfront pools, two onsite restaurants and ocean views from every room, The Oceanfront Litchfield Inn is the best of two worlds: activity filled Myrtle Beach and carefree Pawleys Island .
Paradise Resort
Stay four consecutive nights between Sept. 1 and Oct. 31 and save an additional $60 on your entire stay. A minimum four-night stay is required. Not valid Labor Day weekend.
Prince Resort
Stay six nights or more and save 60 percent off your total stay. Enjoy fully-equipped one, two and three-bedroom condos, along with world-class amenities such as the rooftop lazy river, hot tub and access to the historic Cherry Grove Pier . Other amenities include a fitness center and high-speed wireless Internet. Guests also receive the "Now That's Entertainment" package that includes unlimited free DVD movie rentals and attraction tickets. Offer not valid for existing reservations. This offer is valid Sept. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 .
Sea Dip Ocean Front Resort
Book three nights or more and receive a $60 dining gift card to Captain George's Seafood Buffet. This offer is valid Sept. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 .
Sea Crest Resort
Book a side room for only $60 per night plus tax and fees. This offer is valid Sept. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 . Blackout dates are Sept. 1 through Sept. 6 , Sept. 13 through Sept. 17 and some weekends.
Sea Watch Resort
Stay Sunday through Thursday for two nights and receive 60 percent off the third under this special. Spend your days enjoying fun-filled amenities including six pools, ten whirlpools, and two lazy rivers. Additional amenities include a restaurant, seasonal pool bar, arcade, exercise room, pizza shop and more. Upon check-in guests also receive the Vacation Member Benefits card with exclusive offers to local restaurants, shopping, entertainment, attractions and more. Supplies are limited. This offer is valid Sept. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 .
SeaSide Resort
Stay six nights or more and save 60 percent off your total stay. The SeaSide is a boutique-style resort, boasting epic Atlantic views, modern furnishings and loads of amenities. Bask in the sun at the oceanfront pool and hot tub, or escape the heat in the indoor pool area. Fit in a workout in the fitness center and stay in touch with high-speed wireless Internet. Guests also receive the "Now That's Entertainment" package that includes unlimited free DVD movie rentals and attraction tickets. Offer not valid for existing reservations. This offer is valid Sept. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 .
Surfside Beach Resort
Enjoy 60 Days of Savings with weekday rates starting at $69 , Sept. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 . Proudly called "The Family Beach", the resort town of Surfside Beach sits between Myrtle Beach and Pawleys Island . Here you'll find the newly renovated Surfside Beach Resort with oceanfront views from every guestroom, a state of the art Lobby Market, and a newly expanded oceanfront pool deck.
Thomas Beach Vacations
Reserve two nights or more with Thomas Beach Vacations and receive an extra night for 60 percent off. Guests also receive a $60 resort credit awaiting them on their hotel bed along with a bath linen package. Plus, guests who join Thomas Vacation Club for free receive an additional 600 rewards points, members-only coupons, discounts and more. This offer is valid for new reservations Sept. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 . Other restrictions apply. Use promo code VMB60.
NON-LODGING
Croissants Bistro and Bakery
Croissants Bistro and Bakery will be offering a three-course chef's tasting menu for $30 available Monday through Saturday after 5 p.m. This offer is valid Sept. 1 through Oct. 31, 2015 .
Legends in Concert
Receive two adult premium seats for only $60 . This is a $30 discount per couple. This offer is valid for performances from Sept. 1 through Oct. 29, 2015 .
Palace Theatre
Purchase three tickets for $60 to see Hot Jersey Nights at The Palace Theatre Sept. 1 through Oct. 30, 2015 . This offer is not valid with any other discounts.
